Job Description: Job Description     Bachelors degree in Technology (B Tech) or master s in computer application (MCA) or related field with minimum 5 years experience   Expertise in Oracle 11g database concepts.   Hands on SQL/PLSQL development experience in Operational, ODS, or Data warehouse environments.   Must have strong experience in Oracle SQL PL/SQL, Packages, stored procedures, triggers etc.   Must be able to perform deep dive analysis of data as needed and effectively present the findings.   Technical skills (good to have)   Tuning and performance enhancement experience.   Knowledge and experience in working with other database technologies such as SQL Server, Postgres, EDB etc.   Prior experience in product development.   Must be good team player   Must display a sound understanding of software development lifecycle, with excellent problem-solving skills   Excellent Written and Oral communication skills
PG: Any Postgraduate in Any Specialization, MCA in Computers
